details.Type of Fellowship: Junior Essential Qualification Research Fellow (JRF) division
details.Essential Qualification: Post graduate degree in Science with NET qualification or Graduate degree in engineering (B.E/B.Tech) in first division with valid GATE score.
details.Cut-off Date: Age and Educational qualification will be considered as on the date of interview.
details.Tenure: Initially for 02 (two) years. Can be upgraded and extended maximum upto period of 05 years (including initial period of 02 years) subject to satisfactory performance to be assessed as per DRDO instructions.
details.Reporting Time: 0930 hrs on the date of interview, at Reception, Main Gate ITM, Mussoorie, Landour Cantt., Mussoorie (Uttarakhand)-248179
details.How to reach the venue of Interview: ITM is located at about 4 Kms from main Mussoorie town in Landour Cantonment, (Uttarakhand). The nearest Railway Station is Dehradun. Nearest Bus Stop/ Public Transport is Picture Palace/ Masonic Lodge (approx 4 Kms away).

name: Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellows (JRF)

interview_details: SL No. Type of fellowship Number of Essential Qualification Maximum Age | Date of fellowship fellowships Limit Interview Junior Essential Qualification Research 02 (Two)

details.Application Deadline: 30 days from the date of advertisement

Eligibility Criteria.Eligibility Status: Full time students and Post graduates
